name.description: Award name (e.g., 'Outstanding Contribution Award', 'Member of the Year')

description.description: Description of what this award represents

period_text.description: Free text for the period/achievement (e.g., '1st quarter', '2026', 'Summer 25')

level.description: Award level for ordering (1 = first level, 2 = second level, etc.)

image_url.description: URL to the award badge/logo image

is_active.description: Whether this award is currently active
